metadata.title: MONAG Short Sleeve Tshirt 3 Piece Set
features: QUALITY FABRIC: 100% Ringspun combed cotton. It is fine, soft fabric. The unbeatable fabric is just the best for making quality tshirts. Fall in love with this soft, smooth and durable fabric.

3 PIECE PACK: These Short Sleeve Tshirt sets are available in 3 color packs. Featuring Holiday Colors, Fall colors, and Gender Neutral Selections. Each pack has 3 tshirts in different colors. Refer pictures for fun color combinations.

DURABILITY: All the 3 t-shirts are well made with side seam construction for a better fit and double needle stitch on the sleeves and bottom hem for durability. The long lasting premium quality fabric that will outlast other brands that tear easily, tested and loved by parents.

COMFORTABLE: These short sleeve tshirts feature a simple set in collar. The unisex fit allows allows to move easily. The quality fabric combined with quality contruction makes it comfortable all day wear.
The smooth and soft short sleeve tshirts looks fabulous either plain or decorated. Great for printing, embroidery, applique make Halloween costumes and DIY/Crafts
description: These Soft and comfortable Premium Quality Single Jersey Short Sleeve Tshirt Sets are available in 3 beautiful color packs and a large variety of sizes. They are comfortable, breathable and durable for longer use and multiple wears. This Single Jersey Short Sleeve Tshirt Set features a set in collar and comfortable short sleeves. These packs are perfect to decorate for the holidays or even family pictures, they give you many different colors to choose from to fit all your needs!
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "9.5 x 9 x 0.5 inches; 7 Ounces", "Department": "unisex-baby", "Date First Available": "March 26, 2015"}
